content.detailedDescription:
Just finished dinner, went out for a cigarette, facing west(310 degrees, approx); clear night, constellations visable, no moon, no clouds, vis unlimited, no wind. observed object as to resemble satellite on easterly course(120 approx). object passed through constellation orion and reversed course in a tight left-hand turn unlike satellite or aircraft capability. object proceded west(approx. 300 degrees) for about 3 secs and then abrubtly (at 90 degrees, immediate)turned north towards northern star in orion at approx 4x speed and vanished (approx. 1 second).
sir, i am an faa liscensed aircraft dispatcher since 1982. this was not a conventional aircraft. no visable navigation or other types of lighting were present at any time. the only light on said object was the same as reflected from known satellites, which remained constant throughout all turns. truly a unique experience for me. no other witnesses although i called for them (unable to see due to sight restrictions; near-sightedness.
content.summary: Object coursed from west to east at satellite altitude and speed....

content.detailedDescription: I witnessed the same thing a few nights ago, like that night, i was outside with my dog, and i was looking at the stars like i always do. the sky was just starting to get dark and i noticed a very bright star to the west of where i was standing then noticed the big dipper start to form. that's when i saw a star like shape moving, only this time the shape moved south to north and was moving slowly. there were planes in the sky that had blinking lights, this object did not have any blinking lights and it was luminious like a star. when i look up at the sky i look to see if any thing is moving, and that is what first made me notice it. when i saw the object i was like " not again?" i just noticed something the other night, and around the same time too. my feelings were of astonishment and anxiety, also i said i can not report this, i just reported something the other night these guys are going to think i am nuts...
content.summary: Witnessed star like object moving slowly south to north

content.detailedDescription:
Object hovering in sky then darting left right up down with several dif light colors. object was first seen approx 11 days ago and not seen again until march 18, 2007. first sighting was dismissed as a possible satelite or star. upon seeing the object a second time on march 18th we started recording video footage. we recorded footage for 4 min and 11 seconds at which time the battery ran out. we captured the footage into a computer and with digital zooming had some startling and suprising results that we are interested in sharing. the footage was filmed on a canon gl-2 at 16:9 ratio. we do not feel comfortable posting the footage via the web. 
for additional info please contact us directly. below you will see a few video clips.

thanks
kevin & brad
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Small object with spectrum like details ( video attached)

content.detailedDescription:
Object hovering in sky then darting left right up down with several dif light colors. object was first seen approx 11 days ago and not seen again until march 18, 2007. first sighting was dismissed as a possible satelite or star. upon seeing the object a second time on march 18th we started recording video footage. we recorded footage for 4 min and 11 seconds at which time the battery ran out. we captured the footage into a computer and with digital zooming had some startling and suprising results that we are interested in sharing. the footage was filmed on a canon gl-2 at 16:9 ratio. we do not feel comfortable posting the footage via the web.
for additional info please contact us directly. below you will see a few frames attached as stills, that are zoomed at 330%. 
thank you
kevin & brad
content.summary: Small object with spectrum like details

content.detailedDescription: These pictures we taken on march 17th. this will be the 5 or 6th sighting we (me and my 2 roommates) have had from my backyard. this is a follow-up post from the 12th of march. i have about 30-40 pictures of these white and red orbs. something strange is flying over north phoenix.
content.summary: 5th or 6th sighting in north phoenix - orbs

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my family was driving down a busy highway in cleveland ohio. its weird becuase we was talking about how in the bible it talks about messengers from the sky. my dad didnt agree with us, so he looked over to the left out the window at the big building downtown, and looked the left more and saw a plane, or so he thought. he said look at how fast that plane is going, we was looking at the side of it and it didnt look bright, until it turned tword us. the way it turned was amazing, with lightnig fast speed and very swiftly and sudden. we thought this couldent be a plane. so we pulled of the side of the highway and my mom got out. we was amazed what was coming right over our heads. it was about 80ft off the ground, about the size of a small plane, and 4 "huge" lights on the front. it came about 100 feet away from us and atomaticly turned. before it turned it was going slow and the when it tuned it stoped and flored it extreamly fast and went the opposite direction of us. the it stoped about 500 feet away turned arond straight at us and went probably 1000 mph.
there wher 3 witnesses and our dog we felt very exited as it came and went. and i saw this on the bottom of it  (!)in a blue light.
content.summary: Very fast and stoped and turned

content.detailedDescription: The second photo in the previous submittal was incorrect.  the correct photo has been attached.
content.summary: Attaching correct second photo of squadron

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching my daughter & her friend riding her 4-wheeler up & down the street we live on.It was just before sunset & something caught my eye in the sky when they were riding up the street up hill,first it looked like a cigar shape but it was bright like a star at nite than it went up on it's side & the sun reflected off it & i seen it was a dull stainless steel color disk . i was so shocked i couldn't believe what i'd seen than it changed back to a cigar shape & flew faster than any thing i'd ever seen in my life,it flew over the lot beside our house & there came another one from the opposite direction came to a stop changed into a round tennis ball shape circled each other than took off so fast & disappeared in a flash this happened in late july or early aug. of 2005.I told my family & they said,sure you did, when i seen they really didn't believe me i didn't tell anyone else because i figured they would think i was nuts.I don't care who believes me i know what i seen & i know we are not the only ones around.I seen a totally different type of spaceship last year during the tenn. walking house celebration in shelbyville,tn.2006 there were 4 of us in the car going to the horse show coming in from m'boro,about 1/4 mile from the main street in shelbyville & i was driving,i noticed something lit up to my left in the sky not very high up,i first thought it was a goodyear blimp,until we got closer to it i seen it was'nt & it was lit up inside, i got excited & pulled the car over to the side of the road so i could see better, this thing was about 2 stories tall & hugh & just still in mid air not moving & i thought maybe it was something related to the tn.Walking house event ,than all of a sutton it started moving slow & i could see under it and it was in the shape of a triangle with bluish lights only 3, one at each corner under it,than it took off like lighting , this really surprised me something this hugh traveling at that speed,first not moving than slowly moving but not for very long than zoom gone out of sight.I've never seen anything like this before nor since.I've been watching the sky since my first sighting in 2005.I stay up all nite some nites if there's activity.I have taken pictures of some-things i have no idea what they are, maybe you guys can tell me what they are,from the ground view some just look like stars others change color & shape,but when i download them & zoom them up on the computer as you can see i see something totally different than when i take a picture of it & there is military helicopters started coming here for about the past 6 months a light like a large flashlight comes over the hill behind my home no sound goes a little ways down the fence row than lift straight up & gone,alittle while later comes 2 helicopters with sound lands than 1 takes off.When the helicopters start coming in "they" go up like stars in the sky,when the helicopters leave strange things start happening all over again.I've noticed it doesnt matter about the weather conditions. i need some help!!! would you please look at some of the pictures & let me know what you think these are.
                                              thanks d.L.
                           contact email-sweatndiamonds@gmail.Com
content.summary: They keep coming

content.detailedDescription: We were extremely surprised to see what appeared to be a squadron of ufos in the picture after downloading.  there was no sound of any aircraft and nothing was seen when the photo was taken.
content.summary: Squadron of ufos seen in photo after downloading into computer.

content.detailedDescription: Three cigar shape ufos were seen in this photo after downloading into the computer.  there was no sound of airplanes, and nothing was seen before the picture was taken.  the picture was taken from the backyard of the house.  two previous reports of similar type objects have been filed with mufon.
content.summary: I like to take pictures of the sky because there is always a chance that i will see a ufo.

content.detailedDescription:
While taking pictures of the evening sky, a cigar shape object appeared
after dowloading.  a similar object was seen on february 25th and reported at the mufon site.  we have several pictures of the same shape taken on different days.
content.summary: Cigar shape object  seen in photo after downloading into computer.

content.detailedDescription: Photo taken at a company event. discovered when photo was enlarged on computer recently. i still work for the company and request all people be blocked out. i have copies of the photo before and after the one with the ufo. this photo was taken by another unknown employee and placed on the company computer. i am in the photo and i have no recollection of any abnormal sounds at the time. this is one of the best ufo photos i've seen and i think it may be good for research and identification.
content.summary: Ufo discovered on old photo

content.detailedDescription: Saw above craft hovering over youghagenny river in mckeesport pa....Appeared to be pulling water out of the river ...And in an instant zoomed off to the west at incredible speed..Called into local radio station it was wmck at the time. i was on our front porch that overlooked the  river in port vue /accross the river from downtown mckeesport the pulsating color changes caught my attention vibrant colors... currently was watching history channel and someone had reported a sighting simular to mine...Have told many people but none seem to believe me. was 20  yrs old at the time ..Age  61 now ..Oh the dj on duty at the time i  reported it was terry lee. thank you
content.summary: Cigar shapped with 6 pods for landing pulsating florecent lights

content.detailedDescription:
I have waited so long to come out with this sighting, this is one of the most memorable nights with my friends ever. i still get freaked out thinking about it or talking with my friends about it. this took place a few years ago, so the exact dates and times are not so fresh in my mind but what i am absolutley damn sure about is what we saw that night.  myself and two of my best friend were hanging out, they started to tell me about something they saw in the sky the previous night,they start telling me the story, they saw red and green lights in the sky, heard loud noises echoing through the surrounding woods and echoing across the lake that surrounded the property. i was like ya know what guys it could have just been a plane,but i would find out shortley that it was no plane for sure. it was about that time to leave and go home for the night, i walked outside with my friends, was about to say goodbye to them, but i had to take a quick piss. we started to hear wierd and i mean wierd noises coming from the woods, almost like somethign had landed, or i dont know, maybe something was walking around, but the noises scared us pretty bad. i looked up into the sky for no reason at all and omg i saw what my friends said they saw the previous night, red and green like lights floating in the sky. now at first they seemed small and i thought to myself wait, they still could be planes, but no!  these things started to zig zag and i swear followed us from one side of the property to the other.  they were pretty high up in the sky though, maybe 10,000 feet.  but they were there and i am pretty sure somehow they new we were there to. so these two red and green cirlular shaped lights keep zigzagging through  the corner of the sky, we are excited and yet panicked , but what happened next and what would follow would make anyone cry...(i did)
one of my best friends (there was three of us) stood at the top of his drive way overlooking the ice on his lake as my other buddy and i were still looking in the sky, we kept telling my other friend, look , look...Look in the sky yo, but he was like frozen still like he saw a ghost. he pointed at the ice and said"shhhhh" and right then and there i shit myself i swear and i think my other friend did as well. we saw a tall object, persone, or whatever it was walking across the ice (very tall and lenghty)with long arms swaying. it was like watching a movie..This is no bullshit. we started to hear noises from the other side of the shore of the lake again and heard what i can only describe as cosmic sounds coming from the sky and woods. we lost sight of whatever it was walking on the ice (this was in february) so we looked back into the sky and it seemed as though the red and green lights that were were watching just a few minutes ago were moving away and out of our sight. we new we had to follow them, this was to good, and thrilling to miss even though i was mad freaked out. my dumb friend did not want to bring a camera because he would have to wake his father up, so we had no camera witch i regret so  so much now. we get in his jeep and try to follow the lights in the direction they went.  they went towards harmony (a small town in rhode island just a little ways away from johnston rhode island where the sighting started at my friends house. we eventually lost track ofthese light and someone in the car (one of us three said turn on the radio) we turn on the radio and the fm stations are not coming in clear at all!!  they are mostly static.  we heard that am stations come in better at night than during the day (dont know if thats true or not) so we tell my friend that was driving to put an am station on. as soon as he did my eyes started to tear, i felt so stupid but if you heard what we heard at the age that we were you would prob start tearing too.  we heard  all these different noises, bops, pings, water dripping quick kind of noises with loud commanding noises in the back ground of it( that i sthe best way i can describe it, sorry) it was so freaky. we were like, ok, we need to get to a huge clear area without light and trees to intrupt our view of the sky we have to find these things. we all looked at each other and said, the golf course (i will not name the golf course) but it is in the harmony area. we drove to the course and started to drive up the winding dirt road wich lead to th eparking lot, this was a nice wide open area.  as soon as we took the bend we saw something our eyes had never seen before. there were at least 6 very large very bright star/cross shaped lights in the sky overhead just floating around like ducks in a pond. i started to panic, i was probly the most paniced, i was so frightened that i cryed, the other guys say they didnt but i am sure they did, i dont even think it was that i was scared but more excited and overwhelmed than anything. i called my mother  and told her what i was witnessing she coulsnt believe it she to once had an experience (we both did prior to this one) she said get out of their before something happens. i had to call her and let her know because we did not have a camera.   the driver of the jeep (my friend) flashed his head lights at these 6 or so bright bright lights in the sky an dthey flashed back just as many times as he flashed his lights, i i could not f*^king believe this. i actually got out of trhe car and starte dto shake a flash light around to see if they would communicate again to us. then the flash light got dim (the batterys were not good ) and i got back into the car.  the formed a square, then a circle and then they were gone, they drifted away out of our sight. (they were about 2,000 feet in the air but looked like the size of a pretty big hous (starshaped/ cross shaped) they no longer were green/red cirlces as we had previously seen.  they were about 2,000 yards away but seemed so big and so bright.
when they left the radio started working again.
i had to have my mother meet me at my front door when i returned home.  i was so scared.  i think this is why we have kept this quiet for so long. only the three of us know what we saw that night, until now and how crazy all the events were.  we have seen some pretty creepy things in the sky since then.  if anyone saw this, please let me know. are there any hot spots  in rhode island wher e i might be able to see more of what i saw.

sorry for the long story, but its true.
content.summary: Red and green cirles making dramatic turns in the sky (zig zaging) then saw large bright starshape objects floating in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was taking dog out for last of evening short walk.  noticed unusual triangular cluster of lights much brighter than starlight above tree level in west-northwest direction.  at first thought they were jet plane bright landing lights, but eastern course unusual for cvg.  as i continued to walk, they did not move and were still there when i finished 10 minute walk around block.  i got my toshiba 4.2mpixel camera, and held camera steady agains telephone pole, took 4 photos.  i lightened up photo considerably to accentuated yellowish collection of lights.    camera set at infinity, don't know shutter speed.  by time i took photo object had moved slightly nw, and slightly lower in sky.  definitely not a plane or stars.  viewed object fror 15 minutes at least  gary merhar, md
content.summary: Noticed collection of lights in sky, thought they were air traffic from cvg, did not move over 10 minute time

content.detailedDescription: It sot down from the stars and started to hover in a fild a short distants from calgary and i saw a bright beam come frome the botom and a small skinny creather came and started to look around and it shot bake up into its ship and shot away.
content.summary: It was very fast icould hear a low vibrating

content.detailedDescription: Have a two page discription of the event and object description i would like to send you.  i am a retired 63 year old systems engineer.  i now feel i can talk about this strang sighting that may help verify and contribute information. duration:19:30 to 20:02  weather:clear skies, light breeze, sun:low sw sky,2 hour to sun set.
content.summary: Near horizon bright light coming from nnw, to overhead, to horizon sse

content.detailedDescription:
I had came home from a walk and there in the sky was an unusual object. i was notified by the people in my home, that the object was there for about 5 minutes. i looked at this object and decided to get my cam corder. i recorded some footage and it was in black and white, untill i played it on the television. at first i thought i overreacted, it being just a star, but then when i watched a show on ufo's where your organization was featured i decided to write this email. the video showed an object that first appeares to fade then when i focused in, the object appeared to get brighter. i thought it was quite interesting. when i had a good shot of the object, a number of different colors appeared, from white, dark blue, burgandy, grey, and black. the object then faded and in the camera shot it reapears in the sky. the sky night was clear, also, i thought that my hand was shaking, but when i stabilized it on the balcony window( i live on the 7th floor) and got a clear focused shot of the object it appeared to be moving away and then closer and finally it was moving around as on the camera footage. later the object was not in the sky any longer. a person said it was a star but i and another person who was there that night of the camera footage, witnessed the tape and is convinced: it is quite unusual. 

                 p.S i could not download the video camera to the computer, because of the compatibility of the computer and the video camera.
content.shape: Circle,  Fireball,  Flash,  Sphere,  Star-like,  Triangle
content.summary: I arrived at home and there is was in the sky, i grabed my cam corder and recorded for 5 minutes.

content.detailedDescription:
I don't have a story. the object on a picture just showed up above the city for 2 minutes (when i noticed the object, i went to my room, powered up my camera and has a few seconds remain just fot one shot)

1. planes do not fly above this area of the city.
2. too bright for the star and for the plane, no blink lights
3. showed up and suddenly disappered. moved quickly. planes do not fly that fast. hard to tell the distance - over 10 miles definitely
content.summary: Star like, showed up from nowhere, moved fast, disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
about 12:30 am my brother
> james,cousin dwayne,friend terry and myself traveled
> in a truck from pincher creek, alberta to brocket to
> bring dwayne home to his mother's house(her house is
> about 3 kilometers north of the brocket town
> site.There also about 9 homes within a 5 kilometer
> radius) . we parked in the driveway (the truck was
> facing west) and dwayne got off. he walked up the
> stairs onto the balcony as we backed up he pointed
> to the northeast direction. terry rolled down his
> window and he asked dwayne what he was pointing at.
> dwayne said: "look at those lights over there" we
> backed up until we were facing in the north
> direction. we then seen a group of lights in the
> northeast they were almost above the head smashed in
> buffalo jump site(the buffalo jump is about 10
> kilometers northeast of brocket and about 8
> kilometers northwest of fort macleod, alberta).I
> opened the door and i looked between the cab and
> door.I thought to myself it must be a
> constellation,but i realized i've never seen a
> constellation in that area at anytime of the year.
> the lights did not make any sound nor appear to move
> in any direction. our reaction to what we were
> looking at was very quiet. then in about two minutes
> the group of lights slowly started to dim and fade
> away,which took about thirty seconds.
content.summary: Objects that looked a constellation yet they slowly faded away from view.

content.detailedDescription: Flew from south to north 15 minutes later saw 5 missle looking objects that appeared and disappeared from west to east
content.summary: Moving across the the sky like a snake crawl of about 10 diamond shapes

content.detailedDescription:
We were facing west overlooking soccerfield behind school up in very clear sky with sun behind and to left of object; i and my daughter saw a round shape that changed into a triangular shape in a matter of moments and then it moved from a three dimensional to a two dimensionalvshape as if laying down in the sky and then turning verticle and then disappeared. 

the total time we saw it would have been about seven seconds if counting "one thousand one...Etc." my daughter saw it first as we were walking out of her school building after work and walking out to our car.  as we crossed the parking lot she said' "mom look its another one of those things i saw."  by the time i focused on the object from the time she said to look was a second or two. 

the object was very shiny and fluid like mercury appears when it runs on a table after one of the old thermometers breaks. this shape was in the sky so very high (i do not know exactly how high it was but it was about the size of a small green pea)as we looked at it the shape was changing from that of a silver sphere that she saw to what i saw which was a silver soft curved triangle into a sharp triangle that faced us. this shape then seemed to lay down in the sky and became like a horizontal black line in the sky, no longer having its three dimensional quality.  this took a couple of moments and then this line turned verticle;then it appeared to layforward, remained for a moment and then was gone.  i did not understand how it could have such a shiny surface that appeared to reflect light when the sun was behind it as it was about 4:15pm mountain time. i do not know what it is that we saw, but i have never seen anything like it before. my daughter stated that she has seen similar things before when outside at her school.  the school is located on top of hwy. 16. 

when i first saw the object i wondered if it was a silvery giant balloon like one of those weather balloons that most reports say an unknown object is. but do balloons change their shape from spheres to flat lines and disappear? i don't know.
was this really a balloon or was it something else, i did not know.  i was not upset, but i was positively excited, as was my daughter. we watched the object as we were standing still until it disappeared. 
i know how to describe how it finally left. it was like on an old television that when you turn it off it makes a verticle line and then the line goes to a point and then is gone. 

we were wondering if anyone else saw this as well and maybe they reported it.
content.summary: Very shiny silver soft cornered triangle

content.detailedDescription: Shortly after midnight my family and myself were out in our hot tub there was some kind of meteor coming into the sky when 10 or 12 of theses objects came into a formation in the sky above kansas my wife said get thew camera when i got back outside i snaped this photo take a good look up close at it if anyone out there can tell me what i have would be great becuase we do not have any explanations for it
content.summary: Like a fire in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
First sighted in 2004 from our front porch. we noticed a very bright light hight up on the island. we watched it for about ten minutes until the light went out. i took a look with my binoculars to see what had made the light & i saw a disc like craft. i took a few pictures [not featured because they have been lost] & by the time i set the camera down, it had disappeared without a trace.

the photos featured here were taken in early 2005 on a boat. this marked the third or fourth time i had seen the light in the area. it seems to have some interest in the island. it tends to be stay the same area, but higher or lower.

more recently [as in two weeks ago], we spotted it again at sea level. i managed to take a picture, but it is not visible. which is odd because the light was quite visible.

each sighting is ten to fifteen minutes in length. there is no sound & the craft does not move. it does appear in different spots around the island/bay. it has appeared at several different times during the day. i have only seen it in its non illuminated [disc] form once. if i had to estimate, i would say that it has been spotted at least six times by either myself or a family member.

i'll submit more info/pics next time we see it.
content.summary: Bright light hangs around lummi island/bellingham bay.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking to school ( george abbott scool for boys ) which is at one end of the road and the girls school was at the other, they are all one now. from where i lived i had to come along an alley way, which went under a railway line and then stopped by the gates of the girls school.
as i got to this point i noticed an object in the sky which was strange.
this was a brown cylinder, it was approx 2,000 feet up very distinct, the sky was clear, if i had the camera that i have now, nikon d2h then the photos would have been amazing. what was weird besides the fact that a brown cylinder was just sitting in the sky, was the way that this craft flew.
gravity was not an option, there was no noise from it, it was just sitting there, then it turned on edge and acended about 3 lenths of the craft, leveled off and went along about the same distance then decended the same way, then leveled off again and i thought to myself 'that's weird'. this was back in the 60's sci-fi as we know it had not come about, but even now we have nothing on this planet that can fly like it in that sort of formation and everything still has to conform to gravity. as i said as far as this craft was concerned gravity was not an option. i did not stay to watch more because assembly was at 9am and if you did not want to get into serious trouble you were not late.
since this sighting i have longed to see one again but with no luck.
i hope this helps.
content.summary: At the time i just thought it was weird, but i have thought about this for years.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving to my friend's house, going the same route i always do on chalkville road. it was a clear, pleasant night in march. after i crested the hill i was on and took a left, i saw a remarkably lit triangular shaped craft right in front of me. it was on either one of its sides where its distinct triangle shape could not be mistaken. my initial impression was that this had to be some kind of plane, but the more i looked at it, the less it looked like any conventional airplane. my next thought was that maybe it was one of those stealth bombers because of its triangle shape. but this craft had a large red, circular light in the middle of it. one white light on its nose, three white lights on its rear. i think there was one white light on the other two sides, but i can't remember that detail because i was transfixed by it. shortly after getting a good look at it, i started looking all over for a blinking light somewhere, the kind that all planes have. there was no blinking lights, the lights on it all stayed constant. the craft was on its side when i first saw it, then it flattened out as it flew off into the distance, heading west. my car has a digital compass in the top center console, so i know the direction is correct. also, i always have my driver's side window cracked to thump out ashes and to be able to hear any possible sirens. i mention this because i didn't hear any engine noise, which should have been significant because it was pretty close at first.

the details i kept coming back to were its triangle shape, large red light in the middle of it and no blinking lights anywhere. i thought as it flew off and it straightened out that i might see a blinking light somewhere on it since it was at a different angle then. no blinking lights. i've tried to figure the distance it was from my car and estimate its size, but i really can't. i wished i had taken a picture with my camera phone because it was close enough to make a good picture, but its hard to think straight when you're looking at what i think was a ufo. it was mesmerizing to look at, i couldn't believe what i was seeing. the large red light in the middle of it had me perplexed and stunned. 

after turning off chalkville road, i came to a stop to look at it and had to glance behind me a couple of times just to make sure another car didn't hit me. as it flew off i drove again to try to keep eye contact with it. i did for a short while. two other cars traveling on the same road passed by going in the other direction. i shortly thereafter saw a plane fly overhead once i got to parkway east, a half mile away. i mention the plane because it was easily recognizable, as was its blinking light. i'm not sure what it was, but it was amazing looking. i wished i had taken a picture of it with my cell phone.
content.summary: Saw a triangle-shaped ufo fly over my car as i was driving to a friend's house.

content.detailedDescription:
i live in north phoenix (32nd street and shea area). for the last 3 weeks i (as well as my 2 roommates) have witnessed white and red orbs flying around my home. the orbs have been seen in all directions from the house, as well as directly above the house. this last weekend the orbs were flying extremely close to the house. saturday and sunday i was able to capture about 20 pictures of these orbs. pictures were taken while the camera was on a tripod. 
 

i have a strong feeling that these orbs will be back. i am planning on capturing more images and video over the next few days. i get the impression they like me taking pictures of them. that even sounds strange to me but that���s my belief.

 
i am willing to share my photos with anyone who would like to see them.

1 - in the backyard with my dogs.
2 - the objects were close to a southwest airplane.
3 - a bunch of ballons.
4 - it looks like a little white orb. the orbs seperate and also huddle together. when they are together, it looks like they are battling for the center position. when this happens, it looks like a bunch of ballons tumbling through the sky.
5 - i was thrilled sat. afternoon to get pictues of these items. i was a little shook up when the orbs were directly over my house sunday morning. it almost seemed they were waiting for us to come outside again.
6 - i think they will be back.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Multiple red and white orb sightings in north phoenix (multiple days)

content.detailedDescription:
I was out for an evening of telescoping and star gazing at mu home in atlanta ga.- it was  was 3:27 am sun morn. i was using the finder scope that came with my telescope , it has a 6 x 30 magnification and is great for viewing large areas of the night sky with a good amount of magnification. i had been out looking into the heavens for aprox. 2 hours  when a pulsating very bright ligh came into my view from the right side. the light was not blinking , but pulsating, and that in itself struck me as odd looking, the pulsation of the light enabled me to track the fligh path, had it been blinking i would not have been able to. 

i thought at first that maybe i was looking at sevral lights independant of each other. i thought this only for a split second when i pulled the scope away from my eye, only to not see anything. i quickly re-positioned the finder scope and to my utter amazement, the pulsating light moving extremely quickly across the sky  performed a triangular flight pattern before i lost it behind the trees or it took off so fast that i could not tell if it had disspeard behind the trees or just took off. 
i think the object was very far away,while not visible to the naked eye , i could clearly see it through the high magnification of the finder scope.

i now go out every night between 2-4 am and just use my binoculars to scan the heavens and to behold the beauty of the constellation that are not clearly visible with the naked eye, and for whatever else i might be privy to behold amidst the starry skies.
i actually cried after seeing this performance- i never thought i would be privy to such an incredible display of aeronautics. i have read about various ufo sightings , and had i not read previous info , i might not have recognized the mportance of what i saw, the pulsating -electro magnetic self illuminated light in the sky- perhaps in space, and then to witness the incredible manuevers i witnessed - wow - what a joy- i too can now say - i have seen something , i know not what for sure, but there is a good possibility that it was a ufo of the type most commonly seen by those who have truly seen these crafts and know their behavior.
i count it all joy- what an earth we inhabit.
content.summary: While scanning a constellation in the southern sky- a pulsating very bright light came into my spotting scope and then did a triangular flight pattern all the while pulsating - not visble to the naked eye.

content.detailedDescription: Looked out back the object was treetop leval, had bright lights white, and blue, silver solid. it came toward me, flew so fast but i could remember it was like a triangle light in the middle, and on each side and rear. the bottom was round like an egg shape. it was so low i almost could have touched it. it lasted about 1 to 5 mininutes. there was a humming noise as it was going over.One of my cats was in the room with me. she was nervous too.When it came over the roof behind me, it was like it made a beline for me like it knew i was wathing it.
content.summary: An object went over my house so low i could see the design and lights.It was not a plane or copter.
